actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income tax any pension or annuity received under a public retirement system.

summary.text: Allows an income tax exclusion under the Internal Revenue Code for retirement benefits received under a public system. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 124)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income tax any pension or annuity received under a public retirement system.
